name: 19.2g
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wex(s1, w0))
-| wi(w0, wex(s1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wex(s1, w0))
-| wi(w0, wex(s1, w0))

comment: Theorem 19.2 of [Margaris] p. 89, generalized to use two setvar variables. Use ~ 19.2 when sufficient. (Contributed by Mel L. O'Cat, 31-Mar-2008.)
